name: Space Thing (SatriAli, TijmenUU)
description:
Description

You're a star ship captain in a hostile galaxy.
Travel through space, dealing with the threats you encounter along the way.

Controls Primary Secondary Navigate Arrow keys Numpad 1 2 3 5 Confirm Enter Numpad enter Cancel Backspace Numpad 0 Hints

Press right with an ability selected to get some information about it.
The scan ability (utility menu) allows you to see information about your opponent (info menu).

Information

This game was made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3.
It was built by a team of 2, using Unity.
All code and graphics are original.
Sound effects from the game jam resources' sound pack by Trix (twitter).
